content.question: What will Minghua do if Wenxuan cannot go to the concert on Saturday evening?

choices.label: Minghua will go to the concert alone.
Minghua will not go to the concert either.
Minghua will get a refund of the ticket.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
